pirst 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

    Create STA Data for Simulations

    pirstsim.Rd

    Generates a complete state-trace analysis (STA) dataset for simulation purposes. The dataset includes multiple participants, multiple conditions, and multiple measures.

    pirstsim(
  npercon = 4,
  ncons = 2,
  overlap = 1,
  interactsize = rep(0, ncons),
  noise = 0,
  curve = 0,
  nmeasures = 10,
  cases = 100
)

    Arguments

    npercon

    Integer. Number of data points per condition. Default is 4.

    ncons

    Integer. Number of experimental conditions. Default is 2.

    overlap

    Numeric. ??

    interactsize

    Numeric vector of length ... ??

    noise

    Numeric. Amount of random noise to add to the measures. Default is 0.

    curve

    Numeric. ?? Default is 0.

    nmeasures

    Integer. Number of measures per participant. Default is 10.

    cases

    Integer. Number of cases (participants). Default is 100.

    Value

    A data frame containing the simulated STA data. Columns: X, Y, Condition, Trace, Measurement, Person

    Examples

    # Generate a simple STA dataset with default parameters
sim_data <- pirstsim()

# Generate a dataset with 5 participants per condition and 3 conditions
sim_data <- pirstsim(npercon = 5, ncons = 3)
